name: Dr.Dashley's Monster Madness
description:
WARNING!
If you do not like butt crushing, belly crushing having heavy creatures sitting or laying farting on you, this game is not for you.
Here it is Dr.Dashley's Monster Madness V1.

You play as the evil, mad, insane, genius, Dr.Dashley.
After the Power outage your minions and creations have escaped and are rebelling towards you, time for you to kick there butt and put them back in there cage.

This is my version of Barbftr, but instead of vore this game is more focused on squashing, No sexual or gore allowed.
Ofcourse this game is open for all different kinda enemies, but must have at least 1 squish in it.

A GREAT shout out to  imaginaryz to build the foundation of the game (Barbftr) and is kind enough to guide me trough the difficult aspects of the coding works, and even adding code, and helping around.

Thanks for being patient, and Enjoy playing this game.

''note'' this game is Alfa lots of things will be added.

EVERYONE HAVE FUN WITH DR.DASHLEY'S MONSTER MADDNESS
